name: Snaiku
description:
Snaiku is a game where you make haiku's by consuming various words of different syllable counts, as snakes are want to do. 

The pattern of the Haiku's change each run, the walls wraparound so you don't have to worry about running into them, all the menu's use the arrow keys and Enter, and Escape will pause the game.

Note: I don't know if the mac file works, I don't have a mac, sorry :(
